post.body:
Set 28 years after its predecessor, "Indian 2" follows Chitra Aravindhan, an online media reporter, and his friends as they uncover corruption linked to a tragic suicide. They rally for justice, leading them to seek the help of the legendary Senapathy, who returns to Chennai to combat corruption. As tensions rise, personal tragedies unfold, culminating in a dramatic confrontation with corrupt officials.

Our studio provided the visual effects for the pivotal dog scene, enhancing the film's emotional impact and storytelling.
